attributes.action: Allow rugby to continue during lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
For mental health and well-being of our youth and allowing them to participate in sport. This petition is to fight to keep grassroots rugby for YOUTH going throughout the new restrictions. Benefits: 
- Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 
- Mental health maintained or increased due to the social aspect of sport & looking forward to the activity each week. 
- Improves parents mental health. Taking your child & watching your child will support adult mental health.
attributes.background:
On 31st Oct, Boris Johnson announced a national lockdown in England until 2nd Dec (no guarantee it will end then). 
It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal. All grassroots rugby clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make rugby safe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557727
